name: Add groups to container
description: Add user groups of host to the remoter user (e.g., for device access).

addGroups.description: A file with or entries of groups, see proposals, in the format id(group)[,].

excludeGroups.description: A file with or entries of groups to be excluded from the option addGroups in the format id(group)[,], id(), (name) or () for next.

runAt.description: Specify when to add the users (build or create). Files must be available (e.g., added to the Dockerfile or part of a mount).

storeBackup.description: Backup group and user file to specified location (mostly for debugging or testing).
